tasks.label: train-and-log
args: mkdir -p /home/minshi/Pedestrian_Crossing_Intention_Prediction/train_log && /home/minshi/miniconda3/envs/tf26/bin/python -u /home/minshi/Pedestrian_Crossing_Intention_Prediction/train_test.py -c config_files/ours/MASK_PCPA_jaad_2d.yaml 2>&1 | stdbuf -oL -eL tr -d '\r' | grep -vE --line-buffered '(ETA:|\[[#-]+\][[:space:]]+[0-9]+\.[0-9]+%)' | tee /home/minshi/Pedestrian_Crossing_Intention_Prediction/train_log/train_log_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).txt
